titleStmt.title: A righte noble and pleasant history of the successors of Alexander surnamed the Great, taken out of Diodorus Siculus: and some of their lives written by the wise Plutarch. Translated out of French into Englysh. by Thomas Stocker

titleStmt.author: Diodorus, Siculus.

titleStmt.title: A righte noble and pleasant history of the successors of Alexander surnamed the Great, taken out of Diodorus Siculus: and some of their lives written by the wise Plutarch. Translated out of French into Englysh. by Thomas Stocker
Bibliotheca historica. Book 18-20. English
titleStmt.author: Diodorus, Siculus.
Plutarch. Lives. English. Selections.
Stocker, Thomas, fl. 1569-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Bynneman, dwelling in Knightrider streat at the signe of the Mermayd, for Humfrie Toy,

notesStmt.note: A translation of books 18-20 of the "Bibliotheca historica" of Diodorus from the French version of Claude de Seyssel, in turn a translation of the Latin translation of Janus Lascaris; with the life of Demetrius by Plutarch.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
